text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-1072 (Deemed Approved November 22, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4763

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
October 7,
2014

To confirm the re-appointment of Ms. Velva R. T. Spriggs to the Board of Social Work.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Board of Social Work Velva R. T. Spriggs Confirmation
Resolution of 2014".
Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the re-appointment of:
Ms. Velva R. T. Spriggs
3649 New Hampshire Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20010
(Ward 1)
as a licensed independent social worker member of the Board of Social Work, established by
section 212 of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, effective
March 25, 1985 (D.C. Law 6-99; D.C. Official Code § 3-1201.12), and in accordance with
section 2 of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D.C.
Official Code § 1-523.01), for a term to end March 3, 2017.
Sec. 3. The Secretary to the Council shall transmit a copy of this resolution, upon its
adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Board of
Social Work
Velva R. T.
Spriggs
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
